This new homepage is a static website generated in R (!) with the help of brilliant  `blogdown` package by Yihui Xie. [Hugo](http://gohugo.io/) is the site engine and it also uses amazing [Academic theme](https://github.com/gcushen/hugo-academic). 

More about the blogdown R package you can find here:
https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/

Some additional usefull posts:

* [Updating website with Hugo and Blogdown](https://daijiang.name/en/2017/03/30/updating-website-with-hugo-and-blogdown/)
